titles: A warning agaynst the dangerous practises of papistes and specially the parteners of the late rebellion. Gathered out of the common feare and speche of good subiectes. Sene and allowed.
author: Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584.
publisher: By Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate. These bookes are to be solde [by L. Harrison] in Paules churchyarde at the signe of the Crane,
notes: Printer's name and bookseller's address from colophon; bookseller's name and publication date from STC.
Another state of STC 18686, with "Sene and allowed" added at foot of title.
Identified as STC 18686 at  reel 327:4 and as STC 18687 on reel 1322:3.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 327:4) and Cambridge University Library (reel 1322:3).
keywords: Catholics --  England --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Northern Rebellion, 1569 --  Early works to 1800.
